data.text: Children who are wise ◄pay attention/heed it► when their parents discipline/correct them;
Good people are rewarded [IDM] for the good things [MET] that they say,
Those who are very careful about what they say [MTY] will live a long life;
People who are lazy want things very much, but they will not get anything [HYP].
Righteous/Honest people hate/detest lies,
The behavior [PRS] of those who always do what is right will protect them,
Some people who have nothing pretend to be rich,
Rich people are able to pay people who want to kill them, with the result that they will be protected, not killed,
Righteous people are like a lamp [MET] that shines brightly,
People who are arrogant/proud always cause strife;
Those who acquire a lot of money quickly by doing what is wrong, probably will lose it quickly,
When people do not receive the things that they are expecting to receive, ◄it causes them to despair/they become very sad►;
Those who despise the good advice that others give them are bringing ruin on themselves;
What wise people teach is like a fountain whose water gives life [MET];
People respect those who have good sense,
Those who have good sense always think carefully/wisely before they do something;
Messengers who are not reliable cause trouble,
Those who refuse to pay attention when others discipline/correct them will become poor and disgraced;
It is delightful to receive what we desire;
Those who habitually associate with wise people become wise;
Sinners have trouble [PRS] wherever they go,
When good people die, their grandchildren inherit their money;
Sometimes poor people’s fields produce plenty of food,
Those who do not punish their children for bad behavior do not really love them;
Righteous people have enough food to eat and be satisfied,
